pageSetting.title: 存贷款行员利润分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZBSDBS' and dmz in('5','6','7') order by dmz

col.title: 提前利息支出扣回(万元)
应收未收利息新增(万元)

select.isEqual: select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,dqye,rjye,ftplxsr,zbjsr,tqlxzckh,lxzc,mnlr, rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zbjsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as tqlxzckh, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_gjyj_hy yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yj.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq =cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(sj.ym,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and gl.bbdh=1001 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc) z

select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,dqye,rjye,lxsr,ftplxzc,zcjzzb,yswslxxz,mnlr, rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zcjzzb, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as yswslxxz, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_gjyj_hy yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yj.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq =cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(sj.ym,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and gl.bbdh=1002 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc) z

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,dqye,rjye,ftplxsr,zbjsr,tqlxzckh,lxzc,mnlr, rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zbjsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as tqlxzckh, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then coalesce(yj.zbz,0) else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_gjyj_hy yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yj.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq =cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(sj.ym,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and gl.bbdh=1001 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc) z select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,dqye,rjye,lxsr,ftplxzc,zcjzzb,yswslxxz,mnlr, rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zcjzzb, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as yswslxxz, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_gjyj_hy yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yj.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq =cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(sj.ym,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and gl.bbdh=1002 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc) z ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZBSDBS' and dmz in('5','6','7') order by dmz
